p: On the other hand, the phytotoxicity of essential oil has long been considered as its main constraint regarding the development of other biopesticides (insecticides, fungicides, etc.) Phytotoxic consideration is currently often limited to the trade-offs of efficiency against the targeted pest versus visual innocuousness to the protected crop. As illustrated in Table 1, large variation occurs regarding the phytotoxic properties of EOs or their constituents depending on the application systems and mode of action considered.
